channel.title: RuneWings || Infinity || Reborn
channel.description:
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/cover.png[/img] [url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/RuneWings/163966533620396][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/icon-facebook.png[/img][/url] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/icon-twitter.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/icon-youtube.png[/img]
Content:
[ul][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540891.msg3961411.html#msg3961411] Introduction[/url][/li][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540891.msg3961412.html#msg3961412]RuneWings Infinity[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540891.msg3961413.html#msg3961413]RuneWings Reborn[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540891.msg3961414.html#msg3961414]Other[/url][/ul]
About: We are re-opening RuneWings under 2 new servers, a more classic server (Infinity) and a server with newer content (Reborn). One reason RuneWings Reborn is called Reborn is because the last version of RuneWings was a more modern server with newer content. Infinity is based off of the version before the last moments of RuneWings.
The Team:
[ul][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=495285]RuneWings317[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=454285]Artem543[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=516337]AtomicInt_[/url][/li][/ul]
Supporters:
[ul][li]g0d of war1[/li] [li]tinyscape[/li] [li]Loveandpower[/li] [li]k1ng0frs[/li] [li]Trebel[/li] [li]SilesX[/li] [li]Daginith[/li] [li]neroxx[/li] [li]I InDrEk I[/li] [li]omarsoliman[/li] [li]Skyro[/li] [li]ahram 4[/li][/ul]
RuneWings© 2012

item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Hey guys,
Me and AtomicInt_ decided to restart the server. The main point of restarting is because we’re pretty sick of Project Insanity. I know, I probably said that before. We will now use a real 474 Hyperion. Take note so the developing will be slowly. The older version of RuneWings Infinity will be released.

item.title: RuneWings || Infinity || Reborn
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:91, topic:438172”]normal pi

[code]if (c.playerItems[fromSlot] - 1 != itemID) {
return false;
}
if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemID, amount)) {
amount = c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemID);
}
if (amount < 1) {
return false;
}
c.tradeConfirmed = false;
o.tradeConfirmed = false;
if (!Item.itemStackable(itemID) && !Item.itemIsNote(itemID)) {
for (int a = 0; a < amount; a++) {
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemID, 1)) {
offeredItems.add(new GameItem(itemID, 1));
c.getItems().deleteItem(itemID, 1);

			}
		}
		c.getItems().resetItems(3322);
		resetTempItems(3415);
		o.getTradeAndDuel().resetOTItems(3416);
		displayWAndI(c);
		c.getPA().sendText("", 3431);
		o.getPA().sendText("", 3431);
	}
	if (!c.inTrade || !c.canOffer) {
		declineTrade();
		return false;
	}
	if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemID, amount)) {
		return false;
	}
	if (Item.itemStackable(itemID) || Item.itemIsNote(itemID)) {
		boolean inTrade = false;
		for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
			if (item.id == itemID) {
				inTrade = true;
				item.amount += amount;
				c.getItems().deleteItem(itemID, amount);

				break;
			}
		}
		if (!inTrade) {
			offeredItems.add(new GameItem(itemID, amount));
			c.getItems().deleteItem(itemID, fromSlot, amount);

		}
	}[/code]

yours

if ((amount > 0) && (itemID == (client.playerItems[fromSlot] - 1))) { if (amount > client.playerItemsN[fromSlot]) { amount = client.playerItemsN[fromSlot]; } boolean isInTrade = false; for (int i = 0; i < offer.length; i++) { if (offer[i] == client.playerItems[fromSlot]) { if (Item.itemStackable[(client.playerItems[fromSlot] - 1)] || Item.itemIsNote[(client.playerItems[fromSlot] - 1)]) { offerN[i] += amount; isInTrade = true; break; } } } if (!isInTrade) { for (int i = 0; i < offer.length; i++) { if (offer[i] <= 0) { offer[i] = client.playerItems[fromSlot]; offerN[i] = amount; break; } } } if (client.playerItemsN[fromSlot] == amount) { client.playerItems[fromSlot] = 0; } client.playerItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount; resetMyItems(3415); final Client other = getOther(); if (other != null) { other.getTradeAssistant().resetOtherItems(3416); } if (accepted || other.getTradeAssistant().accepted()) { accepted = false; other.getTradeAssistant().setAccepted(false); client.getPA().sendFrame126("", 3431); if (other != null) { other.getPA().sendFrame126("", 3431); } } client.getItems().resetItems(3322); }

not much changed. Mostly variable names and placement of code.[/quote]

+1 for nick

Read full topic

item.title: RuneWings || Infinity || Reborn
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

normal pi

[code]if (c.playerItems[fromSlot] - 1 != itemID) {
return false;
}
if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemID, amount)) {
amount = c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemID);
}
if (amount < 1) {
return false;
}
c.tradeConfirmed = false;
o.tradeConfirmed = false;
if (!Item.itemStackable(itemID) && !Item.itemIsNote(itemID)) {
for (int a = 0; a < amount; a++) {
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemID, 1)) {
offeredItems.add(new GameItem(itemID, 1));
c.getItems().deleteItem(itemID, 1);

			}
		}
		c.getItems().resetItems(3322);
		resetTempItems(3415);
		o.getTradeAndDuel().resetOTItems(3416);
		displayWAndI(c);
		c.getPA().sendText("", 3431);
		o.getPA().sendText("", 3431);
	}
	if (!c.inTrade || !c.canOffer) {
		declineTrade();
		return false;
	}
	if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemID, amount)) {
		return false;
	}
	if (Item.itemStackable(itemID) || Item.itemIsNote(itemID)) {
		boolean inTrade = false;
		for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
			if (item.id == itemID) {
				inTrade = true;
				item.amount += amount;
				c.getItems().deleteItem(itemID, amount);

				break;
			}
		}
		if (!inTrade) {
			offeredItems.add(new GameItem(itemID, amount));
			c.getItems().deleteItem(itemID, fromSlot, amount);

		}
	}[/code]

yours

if ((amount > 0) && (itemID == (client.playerItems[fromSlot] - 1))) { if (amount > client.playerItemsN[fromSlot]) { amount = client.playerItemsN[fromSlot]; } boolean isInTrade = false; for (int i = 0; i < offer.length; i++) { if (offer[i] == client.playerItems[fromSlot]) { if (Item.itemStackable[(client.playerItems[fromSlot] - 1)] || Item.itemIsNote[(client.playerItems[fromSlot] - 1)]) { offerN[i] += amount; isInTrade = true; break; } } } if (!isInTrade) { for (int i = 0; i < offer.length; i++) { if (offer[i] <= 0) { offer[i] = client.playerItems[fromSlot]; offerN[i] = amount; break; } } } if (client.playerItemsN[fromSlot] == amount) { client.playerItems[fromSlot] = 0; } client.playerItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount; resetMyItems(3415); final Client other = getOther(); if (other != null) { other.getTradeAssistant().resetOtherItems(3416); } if (accepted || other.getTradeAssistant().accepted()) { accepted = false; other.getTradeAssistant().setAccepted(false); client.getPA().sendFrame126("", 3431); if (other != null) { other.getPA().sendFrame126("", 3431); } } client.getItems().resetItems(3322); }

not much changed. Mostly variable names and placement of code.
